When you say its all untrue, you mean all the misconceptions are, in 
fact, correct? That is, there were in fact ninja with straight swords 
and the samurai did refuse to use the 'coward's weapon' gun? If this 
is what you mean, please state your scholarly sources. Otherwise, you 
need to accept the truth of those misconceptions quick. <g>
